ValidationRule.description: The section Lead Score & Grade needs to be completed before setting the lead as qualified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && RecordType.DeveloperName<>"UK_Lead" && RecordType.DeveloperName<>"Yogiyo_Lead" && RecordType.DeveloperName<>"DE_Lead" && RecordType.DeveloperName<>"SE_Lead" && RecordType.DeveloperName<>"FI_Lead" && RecordType.DeveloperName<>"HU_Lead" && ISPICKVAL(Status,"Qualified") && (ISPICKVAL( External_Rating__c,"") || ISBLANK( Number_of_Reviews__c ) || ISPICKVAL( Feature_Competitor__c,"") || ISBLANK( Number_of_Restaurants__c ) || ISPICKVAL( Target_Partner__c,"" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add the following information before changing the lead status: External rating,Number of reviews, Feature Competitor, Number of Restaurants and Target Partner
